projectPurpose: To provide a high-performance platform or gateway for building and serving GraphQL APIs.

alternatives.name: Apollo Server
mainFeatures: Easy setup and integration with HTTP frameworks

alternatives.name: Hasura
mainFeatures: Instant Realtime GraphQL APIs over databases
Actions for custom logic and Remote Schemas

marketPositioning: Tailcall positions itself as a high-performance GraphQL platform built in Rust, specifically targeting use cases where speed, efficiency, and low resource footprint are critical. By leveraging Rust, it aims to provide a performance advantage over GraphQL servers and gateways built on managed runtimes like Node.js or the JVM. Its market position is that of a performance-focused alternative in the competitive landscape of GraphQL infrastructure tools, suitable for demanding workloads and environments where resource optimization is a priority.
